Comments_List: I learned Portuguese so much faster than I thought was possible. Developed listening, reading, writing, and speaking skills.
I can speak decent basic Portuguese!
I learned the present and preterite tense for basic ar, ir and er verbs in Portuguese, immense amounts of new vocabulary, as well as extensive basic knowledge regarding Brazilian culture.

Strengths:
- very small class so we all got very close 
- listening to the lyrics of songs helped a lot with listening comprehension
- learning about Brazilian culture and not only language

Weaknesses:
- textbook reading comprehension questions very odd and sometimes too easy
- textbook did not provide any listening exercises

GREAT COURSE! Looked forward to it every day! Probably the one thing that could have been improved is that the textbook is not incredible and we could have used more outside work to have more language practice.

I would recommend this class to anyone interested in learning a new language. Portuguese is a beautiful language. Brazil's culture is like no other. Easy class if you already speak a decent amount of Spanish.

I LOVED THIS CLASS! Sabrina was a fantastic teacher and I genuinely looked forward to going to class every day. Also, Portuguese is a ridiculous and great language and I'm so glad I fairly randomly decided to take it (already finished my language requirement taking French). In comparison, much less worse than the French classes here (can't speak to other language departments), but I still feel like I have a good grasp of the basics of Portuguese!
